Summary: Two silent, white, streak-like objects heading in parallel direction.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in West Melbourne
There were no other sightings in West Melbourne on or around April 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring the launch of the Discovery shuttle (STS-131) my mother and I observed two, white, streak-like objects flying in parallel without a contrail towards the South. They were not in any way associated with the rocket, and they were most definitely not rocket boosters. My neighbor and I have seen these objects again on July 19th at around 8:00 PM. One was flying above the other and moving in a similar direction to the first sighting. I watched as the perspective on the object shifted from a cigar to a point on the horizon, indicating that it did indeed have shape and was moving.
